text: Kim Hong-kyun is the Special Representative for Korean Peninsula Peace and Security Affairs for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Korea.Senior Officials. Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Korea. Retrieved 11 April 2017.North Korea lashes out at US Navy strike group move. BBC News, 11 April 2017. Retrieved 11 April 2017. On April 10, 2017, Wu Dawei, the Chinese envoy for international efforts to end North Korea's nuclear weapons program met with Kim Hong-Kyun in Seoul, to discuss the issue in detail. == References == Category:South Korean diplomats Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Kim Hong-kyun
